WRITING.TITLE: Did anyone else really enjoy xcom declassified?
WRITING.TEXT:
I loved the original xcom reboot a few years back. And i remember when this was intitially a fps by 2k marin before getting totally rebooted.

Its growing on me. Its not game of the year, and nowhere near as interesting as the initial prey 2 concept, but its solid. Not gonna take RE7s game of the year, so far.

I hate those genres. I hate the designs of those genres, i hate the gameplay trappings. And most of all, the stories dont interest me in the slightest. Why would i spend money on games with mechanics and stories i know Id hate?
And the problem with nioh is that exactly. It borrows the worst part of souls. Its not that its a clone, i dont mind that. But the difficulty ruined the souls and bloodborne games for me. So why would i want something that takes the worst parts of it? I genuinely dont mind "inspired by" games. Nioh asthetically looks good, seems interesting story, but i dont have the patience for souls style difficulty. Had they given it an easier mode, would have been interested. Same with the Surge. Looks great story wise and world wise, but again, difficulty borrowed from souls turns me off.
